name: Fur War
description:
INTRUDER ALERT! Some invaders have been found in the base!

All the base platforms have been shut down. Intolerable! Get on your war ship and turn them again on. Do me a favour and blow up some of them.

Controls: Control your ship with WASD or the arrow keys. Left click to drop some bombs. Right click to shoot a portal.

Made for the #CoronavirusGameJam2

Team Members:

Music, SFX and game UI/UX 

 Alejandro Pérez García: https://twitter.com/sonucais 

3D Generalist and Technical Artist 

 MJoy 3D: https://www.artstation.com/mjoy3d

Programmer 

 Gerard Gascón Moliné: https://twitter.com/G_of_Geri
